OCD.name: HttpService
OCD.description: This service allows the user to enable and configure the http and https connectors in Kura web server. Every change to this service will cause a restart of the web server and a possible temporary UI unavailability.

AD.name: HTTP Ports
AD.description: Specifies a list of ports for unencrypted HTTP. If set to an empty list, unencrypted HTTP will be disabled.

AD.name: HTTPS Without Certificate Authentication Ports
AD.description: Specifies a list of ports for HTTPS without client side certificate authentication. If set to an empty list, HTTPS without client side certificate authentication will be disabled.

AD.name: HTTPS With Certificate Authentication Ports
AD.description: Specifies a list of ports for HTTPS with client side certificate authentication. If set to an empty list, HTTPS with client side certificate authentication will be disabled.

AD.name: KeystoreService Target Filter
AD.description: Specifies, as an OSGi target filter, the pid of the KeystoreService used to manage the HTTPS Keystore.

AD.name: Revocation Check Enabled
AD.description: Specifies whether to check revocation status of client certificates.

AD.name: Revocation Check Mode
AD.description: Specifies the mode for performing revocation check.

AD.name: Revocation Soft-fail Enabled
AD.description: Specifies whether the revocation soft fail is enabled or not. If it is enabled and the gateway is not able verify the revocation status of a client certificate (for example due to a connectivity problem), the certificate will be rejected.
